forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High near 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with occasional rain. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 12C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 54F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
